com.airomo.sdk.ui.fragment

Class AppExploreGridFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.airomo.sdk.ui.fragment.AiromoSDKConnectedFragment
        • com.airomo.sdk.ui.fragment.ExploreGridFragment
          • com.airomo.sdk.ui.fragment.AppExploreGridFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, com.airomo.sdk.ui.adapter.IPageLoadController, com.airomo.sdk.ui.data.IACDataContainer

    public class AppExploreGridFragment
extends ExploreGridFragment
    Explore grid view fragment for application tiles. Create new instance of this fargment using AppExploreGridFragment.newInstance and insert the fragment into your activity. Use setOnItemSelectedListener to listen for user selected item action if needed.
    Author:
    Dennis Gubsky

    • Method Detail

      • newInstance

        public static AppExploreGridFragment newInstance(java.lang.String clientId,
                                 java.lang.String apiKey,
                                 ExploreGridFragment.ExploreGridTileType tileType,
                                 android.os.Bundle filterBundle,
                                 boolean clearTop)
        Create new instance of AppExploreGridFragment
        Parameters:
        clientId - developer client ID
        apiKey - developer API KEY
        tileType - tile display type
        filterBundle - filter bundle to pass to API
        clearTop - true as fragment argument to limit number of tiles and keep it while scrolling content by removing tiles from the top
        Returns:
        new instance of AppExploreGridFragment fragment
